sentences.english: WICKEDNESS has long been the preserve of religion.
sentences.chinese: 邪惡一直是宗教的禁臠。

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
